eligibility: Completed internal medicine, family medicine, med-peds, or infectious diseases fellowship before start (July–June)

requiredDocuments.label: HIV Clinical Leadership Fellowship Application Form
One-page letter of interest to Shanna Livermore, Program Director
2–3 Letters of Recommendation (one must be from your program director)

contactInfo.instructions: Email your complete application package to Shanna Livermore at shanna.livermore@med.usc.edu. If recommenders send letters directly, please CC the applicant’s name.
contactInfo.generalInquiries: For questions, contact Shanna Livermore at shanna.livermore@med.usc.edu.
